purpose: Facilitates the integration of AI agents with blockchain applications on the Solana network.
principle: Utilizes Python to create a framework that enables AI agents to interact with onchain applications, leveraging Solana's blockchain capabilities.
reusability: Designed as a framework with modular components, allowing developers to easily integrate AI agents with Solana-based applications.
limitations: Primarily focused on Solana blockchain, may not support other blockchain platforms, and is in early development stages.
name: agentipy
description: The #Python framework for connecting AI agents to any onchain app on  @solana-labs  ü§ñüêç
highlight: Connects AI agents with onchain applications on Solana using a Python framework.
